tool_description: Provides salary benchmarking data and compensation recommendations based on role, location, experience level, and market data.

experience_level.description: Experience level: entry, mid, senior, or executive

company_size.description: Company size: startup, small, medium, large, or enterprise

industry.description: Industry sector for more accurate benchmarking

error_messages: Invalid experience level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive]
Invalid company size: Use one of [startup, small, medium, large, enterprise]
Location not found: Provide a valid location or use 'remote' for remote positions
Insufficient benchmark data: Not enough market data available for this job title and location combination
usage: Provide job title, location, and experience level. Optionally specify company size and industry for more precise benchmarking. The tool returns salary ranges and compensation recommendations.

median_salary.description: Market median salary for this role

market_competitiveness.description: Assessment of salary competitiveness: low, competitive, or high

data_confidence.description: Confidence level in the data: low, medium, or high
